title: NC solar sector at crossroads after federal funding cuts
description: North Carolina ranks fifth in solar capacity, valued at $14.4 billion, facing challenges from federal policy changes and tariffs.
content: North Carolina ranks fifth in solar capacity, valued at $14.4 billion, facing challenges from federal policy changes and tariffs.
